q: album posted sep 24, 2008 at 9:04 pm by deathbringer. ava inferi, who will enter the studio in november to begin recording third album has announced a special guest on the effort. commented Rune Eriksen : i'd like to announce that our forthcoming album,` blood of bacchus', will have ulver mainman Kristoffer Rygg as a special guest on one of the tracks. we are very happy to announce this collaboration and utterly confident about the final outcome! in other news, ava inferi has been confirmed as this year's headliner of the annual fest biqueira d'a?o, which will take place on saturday, october 4th, in vilar/cadaval, portugal.
